name: Crispy Eggplant
author: Marsroses
summary: This is a great recipe if you are looking for something healthy and easy to make. It goes best with a mango chutney.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons olive oil, or as needed
2 tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro, or to taste
1 cup mango chutney, or to taste
directions: Spread eggplant slices on paper towels
Let excess moisture drain from eggplant, about 30 minutes
Combine sesame seeds, hazelnuts, coriander seeds, turmeric, and ginger in a small skillet over low heat
Transfer to a bowl and stir in bread crumbs
Press eggplant slices into bread crumb mixture to coat both sides
Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat
Fry eggplants in batches until golden brown, about 2 minutes per side
Sprinkle fresh cilantro, Espelette pepper, and sea salt over eggplants
